name: JONI NIGHTMARE (Night 3)
description: It was summer, Joni was at a party, his friend offers him a drink, he takes it whitout thinking too much about it. Moments later temperature gets hot, it gets hard to breathe and his skin starts itching,suddently his mother appears at the party in tears and desperation and tells him his friend was putting a lethal venom in everybodys drink, a strange but powerfull venom that melts your skin to the bones. It was too late.. he had drank from the glass, before he could process something of what was going on people started panicing and droping dead while there skin started desintegrating and a very horrible smell started building in the room, its a matter of time before it happens to Joni, a deep void forms in his stomack, shit got very dark... WAKE HIM UP!
